alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:23PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Morrill County through 715 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, or 26 miles southwest of Alliance, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 around 640 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
